game_description: PaintMusic is a VR art & music game where players can "draw their music" and "play their drawings." Followings are features, which can be enjoyed and experienced through the game. * DRAW & PLAY MODE * VARIOUS INSTRUMENTS * CUSTOMIZE COLORS * LOOP STATION * TUTORIAL * SAVE & LOAD
review_1: The app itself I wouldn’t recommend for anyone looking into music production in vr. As of now the only app that show’s promise is the dj’ing app but other than that, in terms of actually developing music there is a lot that is missing here. Adding a grid or grid snap for note placement would be a nice touch. In terms of how exactly you can write individual 4 bar loops (that play one after the other) I have no idea if that’s even a thing. If I’m writing music I want to be able to distinguish the different loops and have them play separately in order one after the other, rather than altogether. I understand this is in very early development but I hope this could be of some use. I like the idea of the app overall, I just think it needs a little more time to execute it more effectively.
review_2: I like to play this when wanting to wind down a little. I don't paint too much and just use the "Fullscale" pianos. I do wish there were stabilization settings for the brush, the lines come out all jagged. Great concept of an app.
review_3: First, thank you developers for this fun music game , it is a good idea for music learner like me. I like this idea. Please continue to add more music gameplay to this game if possible. Please make this music game easy to learn and fun to play as well. I don't have any music knowledge but want to play music for relaxation. More please. Thank you
